_sText:
Welcome to the longest linear / climb map.


Tier level: 5 - 6
Bonuses: 3 [including puzzle]

THis was deisgned with the following settings:
sv_airaccelerate 150
sv_gravity [default]
sv_maxvelocity [default]

I wanted to design a really long linear map for my server so this was the outcome in 4 days. You can play it @ 27.50.71.212:27016

This map includes:
 - Strafe bonus
 - A random puzzle
 - A long climb



Once your done surfing, try climb back to the top!!!!!!



P.S Thanks jorden [http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197986765412/] for providing da photos..





Sorry for da bad quality.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u7ha07bUGCo
